title: Tag
description: A metadata label used to group and categorize API operations for documentation organization. Root-level Tag objects provide supplementary metadata (description, externalDocs) for tag names referenced in operations — they do not control which tags are permitted. Tags used in operations but not declared at root level are implicitly valid in OpenAPI 3.0 but will lack descriptions and externalDocs. Duplicate tag names at root level are invalid per OpenAPI 3.0.
